EmailTemplate.subject: Register! [Webinar] Get There: Building a Better Digital-First Bank
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Join our June 29 webinar to learn the strategies for building a better digital-first financial institution. Register. <[[https://thefinancialbrand.com/banking-webinars/webinar-get-there-building-a-better-digital-first-bank-ncr-webinar/]]> Shifting to a digital-first approach to banking can be complex. You need to have a strategy, and there needs to be a culture shift at all levels. But it needs to happen now, or you’ll begin to see declining deposits and rising attrition. Join The Financial Brand’s Jim Marous, Synovus’ Liz Wolverton and NCR’s Doug Brown to gain critical insights on building a better digital-first financial institution. What you’ll learn:  - Why digital-first banking is so critical—and how to get there - How to balance convenience & experience vs. security & protection - The steps for establishing a digital-first culture at all levels - What the future looks like for fintech, neobanks and crypto Get There: Building a Better Digital-First Bank Wednesday, June 29 at 2 p.m. EDT / 11 a.m. PDT ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
